description:
When clouds are coming right at you and there's no natural refuge in sight, take shelter in this shell. Waterproof and breathable, its 3 layers of fabric feels comfortable against the skin. The high pockets allow use even when wearing a harness or hipbelt.

  • Made of 3-layer H2No® Performance Standard NetPlus® waterproof-breathable recycled nylon ripstop stops wet in its tracks
  • NetPlus® fabric is lightweight, packable nylon ripstop that’s made from recycled fishing nets to help reduce ocean plastic pollution
  • 2-way-adjustable hood with a laminated visor
  • Treated with a PFC-free DWR finish for exceptional rain protection
  • Handwarmer pockets and zippered chest pocket
  • Underarm vents feature two-way zippers
  • Hook-and-loop cuff closures
  • Left pocket doubles as a stuff sack for easy packability
  • Drawcord hem for adjustability
name: Patagonia Granite Crest Jacket - Women's
